description: This file implements the ConsultationService class, which provides methods to create, list, retrieve, and update consultation records by interacting with an API client. It acts as a bridge between the Flutter frontend and backend API endpoints related to consultations in a healthcare management system.

classes.name: ConsultationService
classes.description: Provides methods for creating, listing, retrieving, and updating consultations via API calls.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new consultation record with specified details and returns the created Consultation object.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a list of consultations with optional pagination parameters.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a consultation by its unique identifier.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing consultation with provided fields and returns the updated Consultation object.

methods.name: _statusToString
methods.description: Converts a ConsultationStatus enum value to its string representation for API compatibility.
